Name: Call for Whitepapers Blogs and Thought leadership collateral
Description__c: This is the idea to notify the team that this is the chance for them to contribute to Yash SFDC branding activities. Please share you entry and the best submissions will be selected and stand a chance to get published on corporate website of Yash.com

Name: Training for the Einstein Analytics
Description__c: This idea services as the poll for Competency resources who are interested in the training in einstein Analytics (now Tableau CRM) Please upvote and leave a feedback

Name: Inventory App
Description__c:
Reduce costs and maximize profits by managing the day’s
stock on hand and giving everyone in the company visibility
into all of the inventory, wherever it is.

Name: Production Scheduling App
Description__c:
Appoint and track producers, directors, designers as
needed, in seconds. Keep tabs on who’s available and
who’s not.

Name: Help Desk App
Description__c:
Keep tabs on tickets; follow cases until they’re closed. Swarm
problems with teams no matter where they are.

Name: Warranty App
Description__c:
Track and manage warranty exposures across every product
line and catch product defects faster.

Name: Make the Idea Portal Visit a mandatory daily task for all PTG SFDC team members
Description__c: Track the logins to Idea portal and employees who are not logging in or spending a good 30 min to 1 hours needs to be reported to Tower Lead. Create a non compliance object to track all such occurrence > 3 records there and the Idea goals decrease

Name: Book My Home
Description__c: This application will be used for people who are searching for their homes in the current City. for example, if someone relocates to any other place if they need to search home for staying, this application will for them.

Name: Resource Reservation App
Description__c: Reserve different types of Resources like room, taxi, JCB, etc

Name: License optimization in Salesforce
Description__c: This applications facilitates Admins flexibility when dealing with multiple Salesforce instances/huge number active users in Salesforce and it also saves license cost in terms deactivating non-active users in Salesforce.

Name: Billing Application
Description__c: This is the application which can be used for managing the bills generated. Also the proper tracking of the associates is in provided in the application.

Name: POC Tracker
Description__c: An application that can be used to track and monitor all your POCs and tasks.

Name: Blood Donation Application
Description__c: This is to manage blood banks.

Name: Remote Assistance
Description__c: Remote assistance is a process that enables you to troubleshoot problems faced by clients with their software or hardware. It is a feature that is commonly utilized by people and companies using Windows-based systems.

Description__c: Nowadays, digital marketing is vital for all businesses serious about remaining in the competitive online market.
